The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: M1.10.WM.nwx v1.0.


> Distribution of rhodolith beds was taken from spatial predictions of suitable habitats for rhodolith forming species at global scales, including both tropical  - warm temperate and polar - cold temperate affiliated rhodolith species (Fragkopoulou et al. 2021). Maps have a spatial resolution of 5 arc-minute. .

::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: M1.10.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

M1.10.WM.nwx (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.M1_10_WM_nwx)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
